                      (2) Every person who is the holder of a Civil Service
               (Special Legal Qualification) Certificate under this Act
               shall, during the continuance in force of such Certificate,
               be entitled to do any act or thing required to be done by
               him in his capacity as the holder of an office in the Civil
               Service of Jamaica which he would have been entitled to
               do if he had not ceased to hold the specified legal profes-
